sentences.en: After dinner that evening, Edith showed them a portfolio of her own political cartoons.
sentences.cn: 那天吃过晚饭，伊迪丝向他们展示了她的一组政治漫画作品。

sentences.en: Along with the books, a portfolio contained sketches and photographs of ancient coins and banknotes.
sentences.cn: 除了书籍, 还有一只文件夹,里面收藏的是古代硬币和古钞的临摹画和照片.

sentences.en: Begin by creating your own design portfolio using these guidelines.
sentences.cn: 使用下列准则组织你的设计作品集.
每位客户的投资组合都是量身打造的。

sentences.en: Finding a job is all dependented upon your portfolio and experience.
sentences.cn: 找一份工作完全取决于你的作品和经验.

sentences.en: He has held the defence portfolio since the first free elections in 1990.
sentences.cn: 自1990年首次自由选举以来，他一直担任国防大臣一职。

sentences.en: His portfolio contains shares in the major steel companies.
sentences.cn: 他的投资组合包括在大钢铁公司的股票.

sentences.en: In this paper, the portfolio investment model with probability criterion is investigated.
sentences.cn: 提出一种基于概率准则的新型组合证券投资模型.

sentences.en: My stockbroker manages my portfolio for me.
sentences.cn: 我的证券经纪人替我管理投资组合.

sentences.en: Short-term securities can also be held as part of an investment portfolio.
sentences.cn: 投资组合里也可以包括短期有价证券。

sentences.en: Take the portfolio and let's talk to the big boss here , okay?
sentences.cn: 你来做部长职位我们跟大老板讲讲 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: The distinction between direct and portfolio ( non - direct ) investment is thus meant to focus on the issue of control.
sentences.cn: 如此说来,直接投资与有价证券 ( 非 直接 ) 投资的区别,集中在控制权的问题上.

sentences.en: We will actively manage your portfolio to maximise the return on your investment.
sentences.cn: 我们会积极管理您的投资组合,使您获得最大的投资回报.

sentences.en: We will actively manage your portfolio to maximize the return on your investment.
sentences.cn: 我们会积极管理您的投资组合，使您获得最大的投资回报。

sentences.en: You’ll need to prepare a portfolio of your work.
sentences.cn: 你要准备一套作品选集。
